General.Name: Banyan Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Banyan Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to focus on identifying business combination targets in the foodservice industry. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Northbrook, Illinois.
General.Address: 400 Skokie Boulevard, Northbrook, IL, United States, 60062
